review.author: Analyst (Gemini)
review.findings: Full integration review: 12 source files, 14/14 IPC contracts verified (preload.js<->workflow.js), shutdown order traced, unsetup pattern safe. Two bugs found and fixed: (1) missing cleanup mock in hivemind-app.test.js, (2) missing shutdown export in transcript-logger.js. 93 suites / 2996 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
